attributes.action: not cut off money for people with special needs Weekly Allowance when they get a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks people with special needs should be able to get paid in their job as well as having their weekly allowance.

Who thinks it is unfair that the DWP/Government take off money for the amount they earn when get paid at work?

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Department of Work and Pensions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
